thread.title: Perrie Edwards Snapchats from BED with footballer boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain
thread.title_full: Perrie Edwards Snapchats from BED with footballer boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain

author: irishmirror
title: Perrie Edwards Snapchats from BED with footballer boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain
text:
Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Perrie Edwards is clearly loved-up with Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain. 
And today the Little Mix star took to Snapchat to share a series of intimate pictures from bed with her new footballer boyfriend. 
Reclining in bed together, Perrie played around with the bunny filter with her beau. 
They then played around with the face swap feature as they sang love songs to each other. Perrie Edwards and her boyfriend Alex Oxlade-Chamberlain in bed (Photo: Snapchat) The couple sang love songs to each other (Photo: Snapchat) 
“I’d go anywhere for you dear… anywhere!” Perrie commented on the Snap. 
Earlier this month, the Little Mixer smashed rumours she's single again by sharing a romantic throwback snap. 
The girl band, who are currently supporting Ariana Grande on tour in the US, shared the kissing picture of the pair kissing in front of the Eiffel Tower in Paris with the simple caption: "Him." They also face swapped (Photo: Snapchat) 
It isn't clear when the snap was taken but the couple look very much in love in the romantic snap against the glittering lights of the iconic building. 
Fans were overjoyed the pair were still an item after Perrie, 23, deleted the only snap of the footballer from her Instagram. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
